response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it. My initial offer for this exceptional item is $15,000. I believe this price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the potential benefits it could bring to you. I look forward to your response and the possibility of making this extraordinary product yours.", "product_price": 15000}
